snippet: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky, the Republican leader, appeared to get caught in his own trap on Thursday as lawmakers continued their work to avert the pending fiscal crisis. Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, the Senate majority leader, called Mr....
abstract: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky, the Republican leader, appeared to get caught in his own trap on Thursday as lawmakers continued their work to avert the pending fiscal crisis. Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, the Senate majority leader, called Mr. McConnell’s bluff.
lead_paragraph: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky, the Republican leader, appeared to get caught in his own trap on Thursday as lawmakers continued their work to avert the pending fiscal crisis.

headline.main: Reid Calls a Bluff, and McConnell Objects
